mapper.select: SELECT r.r_id,c.cm_id,c.cm_co_name,r.r_title,r.r_sal,r.r_start_date,r.r_end_date,r.r_time,c.cm_homepage,c.cm_co_logo, c.cm_co_type,c.cm_emp_num,c.cm_establishment_year,r.r_info,rf.rf_fields,rs.rs_names,r.r_registration_date,r.r_registration_state, r.r_recruitment_volume,d.d_name,ind.ind_name,e.education,et.et_name,wa.wa_name,rec.rec_name FROM recruitment r JOIN company_member c ON r.cm_id = c.cm_id LEFT JOIN duty d ON r.d_id = d.d_id LEFT JOIN industry ind ON r.ind_id = ind.ind_id LEFT JOIN education e ON r.e_id = e.e_id LEFT JOIN employment_type et ON r.et_id = et.et_id LEFT JOIN working_area wa ON r.wa_id = wa.wa_id LEFT JOIN re_career rec ON r.rec_id = rec.rec_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT r_id, LISTAGG(rf_field, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY rf_field) AS rf_fields FROM recruitment_field GROUP BY r_id ) rf ON r.r_id = rf.r_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT r_id, LISTAGG(rs_name, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY rs_name) AS rs_names FROM recruitment_skill GROUP BY r_id ) rs ON r.r_id = rs.r_id WHERE r.r_id = #{r_id}
select d.d_id, d.d_name,count(r.d_id) as d_cnt from duty d left join recruitment r on d.d_id = r.d_id group by d.d_id, d.d_name
select wa.wa_id, wa.wa_name,count(r.wa_id) as wa_cnt from working_area wa left join recruitment r on wa.wa_id = r.wa_id group by wa.wa_id, wa.wa_name
select rc.rec_id, rc.rec_name, count(r.rec_id) as rec_cnt from re_career rc left join recruitment r on rc.rec_id = r.rec_id group by rc.rec_id, rc.rec_name
select ind.ind_id, ind.ind_name,count(r.ind_id) as ind_cnt from industry ind left join recruitment r on ind.ind_id = r.ind_id group by ind.ind_id, ind.ind_name
select e.e_id, e.education,count(r.e_id) as e_cnt from education e left join recruitment r on e.e_id = r.e_id group by e.e_id, e.education
select et.et_id, et.et_name,count(r.et_id) as et_cnt from employment_type et left join recruitment r on et.et_id = r.et_id group by et.et_id, et.et_name
SELECT mr.mr_id, mr.mr_title, mr.mr_registration_date FROM member m LEFT JOIN member_resume mr ON m.m_id = mr.m_id WHERE m.m_id = #{ m_id }
mapper.insert: insert into application( a_id, r_id, cm_id, mr_id, m_id, a_recruitment_condition, a_date, a_condition ) values( 'app_' || LPAD(app_seq.NEXTVAL, 5, '0'), #{ r_id }, #{ cm_id }, #{ mr_id }, #{ m_id }, 'N', sysdate, 'Y' )
